oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ward Letter Mule Imbroglio
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greene, Colton; Civil War; military; correspondence;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lt. Col. Samuel J. Ward, in the field, to Col. Colton Greene: sending information requested that conversation with Capt. Hooper was simply an unofficial discussion of a rumour from "one gentleman to another" and that to Ward's knowledge, Greene never ordered evasion of the order.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
